title: Chapter 1376 - The Divine Replenishment Furnace
volume_title: His Sword Takes Aim A The Three Thousand Worlds Of The Stars, Suppressing Foes Both Past And Present
body:
Chapter 1376 - The Divine Replenishment Furnace

The Divine Replenishment Furnace? Quite the domineering name, thought Su Yi.

As he examined it with his divine sense, he discerned some of its mysteries.

The furnace’s greatest wondrous application was extracting the power and spirituality from everything it encountered. It could draw out the essence of all manner of divine materials and medicines.

Furthermore, it could refine divine treasures and weapons, and it could even display terrifying strength in battle. The furnace could effortlessly refine still-living enemies until nothing remained of them but ash!

It was fair to say that there was nothing it couldn’t refine!

Unfortunately, Su Yi couldn't tell where this furnace came from. Its source power was severely damaged, and although it still had an abundance of spirituality, this still wasn’t its completed state.

“Next time I see Daoist Master Red Cloud, I can perhaps ask if she knows the Divine Replenishment Furnace’s origins,” whispered Su Yi.

In the Age of Fallen Immortals, Daoist Master Red Cloud and many of her clansmen left just before disaster struck and sought refuge in the Human Realm.

In other words, Daoist Master Red Cloud and the Divine Replenishment Furnace both originated from the Age of Fallen Immortals.
